name: Satiscliqqer!
description:
What is Satiscliqqer?
Well, it can be whatever you want! Use it to relieve your inner stress by popping everything on the screen (it's kinda like virtual bubble wrap, actually). What about using it to practice your aim? What about competing with your friends to see who is the fastest clicker? What about... yeah you know what I mean. The possibilities are endless!

How do you play Satiscliqqer?
It's quite simple. Your goal is to pop all the so-called 'cliqs' on the screen. Together with cliqs there are 'chains'. These are just like cliqs, but in a chain! These can all be popped with a quick swipe. When you pop everything on the screen, new cliqs and chains will appear! You'll also earn 5 gems which can be used to buy 'cliqqers'. Cliqqers are different items with their own unique popping sound. That's right, you decide how the satisfying pops should sound!

I don't even know why I made this game but please start clicking pls
